clubs.name: Horsemen of the Hopocalypse
clubs.description: We are a homebrew club where beer enthusiasts and hobbyists come together to share their passion for brewing and everything related to beer. We meet to exchange tips, techniques, and ideas on how to create the perfect pint. Join us today and discover the joy of homebrewing in Fort Worth!

clubs.name: Denton County Homebrewers Guild
clubs.description: Founded in 2012, the DCHG is a vibrant community for enthusiasts to explore homebrewing, mead making, and natural fermentation. We provide a fun, inclusive space to master new techniques and share craft experiences while producing quality beverages. Whether you're a seasoned brewer or a curious beginner, join us in Denton on the first Sunday of every month to share a story and a pint!

clubs.name: Cap & Hare
clubs.description: We hold monthly meetings that feature presentations about brewing beer, with occasional discussions about making cider, mead, or wine. Members and guests are encouraged to bring samples of their own homebrew to the meeting to share with others. Our meetings are a great place to socialize with others with an interest in homebrewing, while also learning how to begin or improve your own homebrewing.

clubs.name: North Texas Homebrewers Association
clubs.description: The North Texas Homebrewers Association (NTHBA) is a group of homebrewers living in North Texas (mostly, but not limited to, Dallas and northern suburbs). We are interested in making beer, mead, cider, wine, and other fermented beverages at home.
